page.title: 05The Games children play
page.content: {British Bulldogs}is a game played mostly by boys.To play the game,you need a big,open space and any number of children.The idea of the game is for one person to stand in the centre of the space and say,"British Bulldogs 1,2,3.".Then the rest of the children who are on the edge of the space must run from one side to the other side without letting the person in the middle catch them.The game goes on until everyone is caught. { {Three and In}is a popular game for boys and girls.It starts when one child is in goals and the other children have to score three goals by beating the other players and the goalie. When one child scores three goals he or she is in goals and the game starts again.
